base_description: White ceramic toilet with a modern design.
part_description: Consists of a tank, bowl, and seat; tank at back, bowl below, seat on top.
internal_interaction_description: The tank holds water that flows into the bowl when flushed. The seat is hinged to allow lifting. The bowl is designed to direct waste efficiently to the plumbing system below.
external_interaction_description: Used by people for sanitation purposes. Connects to plumbing for water supply and waste disposal. Requires regular cleaning and maintenance to ensure hygiene and functionality.
